name: linux-tutorial-cms
description: A modern, fully customizable CMS for creating beautiful tutorial websites with React and Rust
author: zerox80

_scripts._comment: NPM Scripts for Linux Tutorial CMS Development Workflow

_development.dev: vite - Start development server with hot module replacement
_development.preview: vite preview - Preview production build locally

_building.build: vite build - Build production bundle with optimizations

_code_quality.lint: eslint src --ext js,jsx - Run ESLint on source files
_code_quality.test: vitest - Run unit tests with Vitest
_code_quality.test:ui: vitest --ui - Run tests with visual interface
_code_quality.test:coverage: vitest run --coverage - Generate test coverage report
_code_quality.test:e2e:ui: playwright test --ui - Run E2E tests with visual interface

_content_management.export-content: cargo run --manifest-path backend/Cargo.toml --bin export_content - Export all CMS content to JSON
_content_management.import-content: cargo run --manifest-path backend/Cargo.toml --bin import_content - Import CMS content from JSON file

_documentation.docs:check: jsdoc -c jsdoc.json && eslint --ext .js,.jsx src/ --plugin jsdoc - Validate JSDoc comments
_documentation.docs:coverage: documentation coverage src/ --threshold 95 - Check documentation coverage (95% threshold)
_documentation.docs:lint: eslint --ext .js,.jsx src/ --plugin jsdoc --plugin jsdoc/check-format - Lint documentation format
_documentation.docs:generate: documentation build src/ -f html -o docs/ - Generate HTML documentation
_documentation.docs:serve: documentation serve src/ --port 4000 - Serve documentation locally
_documentation.docs:build: npm run docs:generate && npm run docs:coverage - Build docs and check coverage
_documentation.docs:verify: npm run docs:check && npm run docs:coverage - Complete documentation validation
_documentation.docs:watch: documentation serve src/ --watch --port 4000 - Serve docs with auto-reload

scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:generate && npm run docs:coverage
scripts.docs:verify: npm run docs:check && npm run docs:coverage
